attributes.action: In a general election there should be the facility to vote "None of the above'
attributes.additional_details: Because of a  apparent disconnect between the electorate and the representatives in Parliament
attributes.background: Enact legislation to cater for the above facility open to.any voter

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Add a "None of the above" option for General Elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617575
